comment:
CR-082 Pre-Review — QA Assessment

OUTCOME: REQUEST UPDATES — One finding requiring clarification before recommendation.

FRONTMATTER VERIFIED:
- title: "Implement ADD (Addendum) Document Type" — present, non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for v0.1

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and correctly ordered (Sections 1-12). No missing sections.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found in pre-approved content. Execution-phase placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], etc.) in the EI table and Execution Summary are appropriate per SOP-004 Section 5 (editable fields are blank until IN_EXECUTION).

TRACEABILITY: INV-011 confirmed IN_EXECUTION (v1.2). CAPA-003 origin is valid. All referenced documents (SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SDLC-QMS-RS, SDLC-QMS-RTM) are valid.

FORMATTING: Consistent section numbering, well-formed tables, consistent code block formatting. No typos detected.

PLAN COMPLETENESS: 7 phases with 9 EIs provide adequate coverage. Phase-to-EI mapping is logical. Development controls (Section 7.4) and qualified state continuity (Section 7.5) follow established patterns.

TESTING: 7 new qualification tests with clear descriptions. Full regression requirement (396+ tests) stated. Coverage appears adequate for the scope.

SOP IMPACTS: Correctly identified SOP-001 (Sections 2, 3, 6.1, 8.2) and SOP-004 (Section 2, new Section 9B).

PATTERN CONFORMANCE: ADD mirrors VAR structurally as stated. Semantic distinction (during-execution vs post-closure) is clear.

FINDING (requires clarification):

Section 5.1 states valid parent types are "CR, INV, VAR, ADD (all executable types that reach CLOSED)." However, TP and ER are also executable documents that reach CLOSED status. The parenthetical claim "all executable types that reach CLOSED" is inaccurate because TP and ER are excluded. The CR must either: (a) include TP and ER as valid parent types, or (b) explicitly state why TP and ER are excluded from valid parent types and remove the inaccurate parenthetical. This is a scope clarity issue — the current text creates ambiguity about whether the exclusion is intentional design or an oversight.

CR-082 Pre-Review Round 2 — QA Assessment

OUTCOME: RECOMMEND

FINDING RESOLUTION: The prior finding regarding Section 5.1 has been satisfactorily addressed. The misleading parenthetical "(all executable types that reach CLOSED)" has been removed. The updated text now explicitly names the excluded types (TP, ER) and provides clear rationale: test-related corrections are handled by ER and nested ERs per SOP-004 Section 9; ADDs address non-test executable documents only. The design boundary is now unambiguous and consistent with Section 4 (Proposed State).

FULL RE-VERIFICATION (no regressions):
- Frontmatter: title = "Implement ADD (Addendum) Document Type"; revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1)
- All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and correctly ordered
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in pre-approved content
- Execution-phase placeholders appropriate per SOP-004 Section 5
- Traceability to INV-011 CAPA-003 confirmed
- Formatting consistent, no typos detected
- Section numbering sequential with no gaps
- Files affected lists in Sections 2.3 and 7.1 are mutually consistent
- 7 phases, 9 EIs, adequate test coverage (7 new tests + full regression)
- SOP impacts correctly identified (SOP-001 Sections 2,3,6.1,8.2; SOP-004 Section 2, new 9B)
- Development controls and qualified state continuity documented

Document is COMPLIANT. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

CR-082 Post-Review -- QA Assessment

OUTCOME: RECOMMEND

FRONTMATTER VERIFIED:
- title: "Implement ADD (Addendum) Document Type" -- present, non-empty
- revision_summary: "Execution complete: all 9 EIs pass" -- present, descriptive

EXECUTION TABLE (Section 10) -- All 9 EIs verified complete:
- EI-1: Pass. Branch cr-082-add-document-type created, 396 existing tests pass.
- EI-2: Pass. SDLC-QMS-RS v13.0 EFFECTIVE (REQ-DOC-015 added, REQ-DOC-001/-002/-005/-012 updated, REQ-WF-003 updated).
- EI-3: Pass. 5 files modified (qms_config.py, qms_schema.py, qms_paths.py, commands/create.py, commands/close.py).
- EI-4: Pass. TEMPLATE-ADD v1.0 EFFECTIVE. Em dash inconsistency found and corrected during review cycle.
- EI-5: Pass. 7 new qualification tests, 403 total tests passing.
- EI-6: Pass. SDLC-QMS-RTM v15.0 EFFECTIVE. Qualified baseline CLI-7.0, commit dffd56c.
- EI-7: Pass. PR #13 squash-merged to main, commit dffd56c.
- EI-8: Pass. SOP-001 v20.0 EFFECTIVE (Sections 2, 3, 6.1, 8.2 updated).
- EI-9: Pass. SOP-004 v4.0 EFFECTIVE (Section 2, 3 updated; new Section 9B added).

All EIs have: Task Description, Execution Summary, Task Outcome (Pass), Performed By with date.

REFERENCED CONTROLLED DOCUMENTS -- All confirmed EFFECTIVE:
- SDLC-QMS-RS v13.0 EFFECTIVE
- SDLC-QMS-RTM v15.0 EFFECTIVE
- TEMPLATE-ADD v1.0 EFFECTIVE
- SOP-001 v20.0 EFFECTIVE
- SOP-004 v4.0 EFFECTIVE

QUALIFIED BASELINE VERIFIED:
- RTM Section 6.1 commit hash: dffd56c -- matches CR-082 EI-7 reference
- 403 tests, 0 failures, CI run URL recorded

OPEN VARs: None. No VAR files found under CR-082 directory.

EXECUTION COMMENTS: Three comments properly documenting (1) execution order deviation from plan with rationale, (2) em dash finding corrected during EI-4 template review, (3) test rename for consistency. All signed with performer and date.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete and accurate. Covers all deliverables (code, template, tests, requirements, traceability, procedures). States no VARs required. Documents the em dash correction. Confirms CAPA-003 from INV-011 is fulfilled.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found (no TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX).

FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. Tables well-formed, section numbering sequential (1-12), no typos detected.

SDLC PREREQUISITES per SOP-002 Section 7.3 item 5: RS v13.0 and RTM v15.0 both EFFECTIVE -- satisfied.

Document is COMPLIANT. All post-review criteria per SOP-002 Section 7.3 and SOP-004 Section 10 are met. Recommend proceeding to post-approval.
